name: Draugr Overlord
stunts: Unrelenting Force: Once per scene, use Lore to create 'Knocked Back' situation aspect on all targets in zone (opposed by Physique)
Frost Cloak: Attackers in melee range take 1 stress automatically each exchange
Undead Resilience: Immune to mental attacks, poison, and disease. Armor: 2 against physical attacks
Summon Draugr: Once per encounter, summon 2-3 lesser draugr minions
notes: Draugr Overlords are the most powerful of the ancient Nordic undead. They were once great warriors or priests who were entombed with powerful artifacts and sworn to guard them for eternity. They possess devastating combat prowess and can use ancient Thu'um (dragon shouts). They're intelligent enough to use tactics but are bound to their tombs by ancient magic.

special_mechanics.shout_cooldown: After using Unrelenting Force, cannot use again for 3 exchanges

combat_tactics: Overlords open combat with Unrelenting Force to scatter enemies, then close to melee range where their Frost Cloak is effective. They'll summon lesser draugr if outnumbered. They fight to the death, as they cannot leave their assigned post.

location_specific: Word of Power (if near word wall)

variants.name: Draugr Deathlord
variants.changes: Replace Superb Fight with Fantastic (+6), add Ebony equipment

variants.name: Dragon Priest
variants.changes: Replace Fight focus with Lore (Superb), add multiple Thu'um abilities, dragon priest mask
